incrementItem(Inventory.ItemType) - Method in class Inventory
Increments the current number of an item by one.
incrementTotalSteps() - Method in class Data

Inventory - Class in Unnamed Package
Class to store game specific items, such as pokéballs.

Constructor for the Inventory class, initializes all items with a set amount.

Custom type to represent items used.

isGameOver(int) - Method in class GameLogic
Checks for the two game over conditions: running out of pokéballs or reaching 100 steps.
